com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Common
Class ErrorStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Common.ErrorStream
public class ErrorStream
extends java.lang.Object

The error stream class. An instance of this class is used to control the output of error and warning messages.

Since:
JTS 1.2.4.

stream

public static java.io.PrintWriter stream(java.lang.String s,
                                         int severity)
